Label: project_description
Value: This project was carried out by the Dutton lab to determine the bacterial and fungal diversity of cheese rinds.  Cheese rind biofilm samples from 137 cheeses, produced in 10 different countries, were analyzed by Illumina sequencing of the bacterial 16S rDNA (V4 region) and the fungal ITS1 region.

Label: biome
Value: Temperate broadleaf and mixed forest biome
